(* RR's for all cause mortality and incidence of lung cancer COPD CHD CVA oropharyngeal- larynx- esophagus- stomach- pancreas- bladder- kidneycancer CHF.
within event type specified by gender within gender by smoking-class (currentformer) within smoking class by 5-years ageclasses (rest class 85+).

      Bron: RR rapport Hoogenveen dec 2004           
      Bij de vrouwen zijn voor totale mortaliteit en longkanker alleen studies meegenomen die startten na 1980

Source: RR smoking report 2005

New RRs for COPD, 21-20-2005

*)
